reviews.text: This place is so dependable and has the fastest delivery ever. Very traditional, reasonably priced, great service to boot
Et fantastisk og autentisk sted. Et stort udvalg af rigtig god mad. Personalet var fantastisk.
The place is overpriced and the food is really not that great
The best in the BX

Great Diner. Short walk to Yankee Stadium. Fast, friendly service. We got grilled cheese (so buttery), chicken parm (the bun!!), and the bronx bomber all were so good. Definitely stopping next time we are in the city.

Just a short walk from the entrance to Yankee Stadium. The half a sandwich/ soup combo is very good. Service very efficient. Rest room clean. My only caveat is that the corned beef in my sandwich was just slightly rubbery.

The food is good but pretty pricey in my opinion. Iâ€™m assuming the target market is the court staff from the courts nearby. The takeout counter staff is very slow, always get your receipt because sometimes the guy at the takeout counter charges incorrectly.

Prompt seating before a Yankees game.
Perfect cheese steak sandwich.    Perfect open faced Reuben sandwich with fries...enough for 2.

Ordered a chicken gyro off of grubhub, and instead they sent me a lamb gyro, when I called the restaurant to complain, they said that they would send me the chicken gyro, but they never did, and when I called back, they said, oh my bad, weâ€¦

Too many flys!!!
And they allow mon- customers to use the restroom.
Floor is dirty, tables sticky.
Oh and there was a fly in the sugar that I just used.
Foodâ€¦ is very good tho.
Please change these things so we can come back!!
A neighborhood gem and a true classic New York diner. Food is delicious, portions are very generous, and the staff is always friendly.

The Court Deli, if you like generous portions of delicious food at affordable prices served by friendly, attentive people is the place to eat. It'll be your PLEASURE if you are served by TONY!!! His friendly customer service, menu knowledge &   attention to YOUR DETAIL, even when it's busy proves him to be an ASSET to Court Deli. I will continue to dine there & enjoy their food, Excellent Customer Service & cleanliness. THANK YOU!
Great little pitstop after the Yankees game. So many good options and our kids were well catered for.
They didn't let me beat my meat
There fried chicken is horrible no flavor and no seasoning.

Always nice servers
Sometimes weird people come in but that doesn't take from the service or food

I ordered overeasy with potatoes and white toast. With diet cream soda.
The price is reasonable considering that everything is going up. Plenty of seats good for all types of people from singles to groups.
This is my absolute favorite spot for a quick and satisfying breakfast before every Yankee game. I always get the eggs, pancakes, bacon, and coffee â€“ it never disappoints, and I always leave full!
Told me they were closed even though here on google it says it closes at 9pm EST. we made it there at 8:26 pm with a desire to eat the food I was craving. Such a shame it has to come to this.
90%  all around the board.

#whereisweekes......JESSICA DE BOMB.COM of Court Delig da.....was our hostess with the most. Jessica made we were good throughout our breakfast. As you can see, the food was great, and so was the Mimosas. Oh, we will be back next time with our Jessica.
Food was not worth the money â€¦ prices need improvement
Great place to dine before going to the game!
I ordered home fries, sausage & scrambled eggs with mozzarella cheese and spinach. The food was amazing and so was the service 10/10
Ordered and they have listed on Google and on other service providers they are opened. They aren't answering the phone and aren't opened.
Good food and service with reasonable prices what else can you ask for.

You do NOT want to believe what I just witnessed in this place. A WHOLE family of mice. Iâ€™m talking about, 6 to 7 mice running around and one big momma who keeps giving birth to them. Iâ€™m telling you, walk past this place at night , you will see what Iâ€™m talking about. Disgusting!

Disgusting service , very racist they basically kicked us out and we wasnâ€™t even done with the our food . Never coming here again will never waste my money here ever that male waiter left very distasteful feeling

Brought two corned beef sandwiches for $40+ dollars. Totally disappointed. I have purchased the same sandwichâ€™s prior but this time the corned beef was dry as the Sahara. Mustard was on the sandwich could not taste it and the Swiss cheese on the sandwich didnâ€™t even melt which also tells the meat was not warm. I donâ€™t mind paying for what I want but what I got was trash and a waste of money. I wonâ€™t revisit and will go where itâ€™s $30 a sandwich and I know itâ€™s fresh. To add insult even the coleslaw very was dry.
Perfect service and fresh breakfast ğŸ³

Old school Greek diner... split pea soup...cheeseburger deluxe...turkey club...bacon and eggs
.all good.

Food is good overall as well as the service. but itâ€™s just the cleaning. I found rat poo litters all by the window table ledges and it smelled exactly like rat extracts if you put your nose to it. Seriously gotta clean that or do some extermination.
I get it from Grubhub the food is delicious, breakfast lunch dinner always perfect
Convenient and fast service. In and out in 45 mins max.
Great pastrami and eggs sandwich
Today was the perfect day for some chicken noodle soup and let me tell you this soup hit the spot. I paired it with the grilled cheese and Walla.
My favorite diner between Bronx and Harlem. Love the service. The food is delicious. Never a long wait time. Rise on

The place overall is ok. A little outdated. The food is ok. Our server Tony was absolutely spot on. He takes jokes really well, is pleasant and quick with the service. He also didn't accept a tip when I paid in credit card.

For many years..my husband and I used to travel from ct. to eat at the Court Deli then shop Arthur Avenue!!!!! The most delicious pastrami sandwich next to Katzâ€™s in Manhattan!! Honestly miss it with all my heart!! Totally recommend it.. the fries are fantastic too!

Love from a huge fan..
I donâ€™t recommend at all. Scam. This place charges higher prices for the same items versus whatâ€™s listed on the menu. Iâ€™ll be reporting this to the city.

Absolutely nothing to brag about.  I ordered the Virginia ham meal and was actually not at all surprised to hear it was not available .  I guess the freezer where they keep all their frozen meal's was broken .  The place was pretty much empty.  Probably because it is one ugly neighborhood .
The pastrami was fatty and rubbery,never again would I recommend this place

It was sooo good I forgot to take a picture of my food, this is whatâ€™s left lol. I had half of pastrami on rye with mustard. It was good. I could have had a little more meat but that may be because Iâ€™m spoiled by KATz. The pastrami was tender and juicy. The French fries were good. They were steak fries. The diner is well lit with natural light. The service was superb. He was fast, courteous, efficient.
I go to this spot to pick up food to take into yankee stadium when we go watch the games. Stadium food is expensive and this deli is only a few blocks up.

The reason why I voted so poorly is because I took a cab to arrive before it was too late for them to serve. I got there a few minutes before 8 . The server was very nice she told me I still had about 45 minutes which was okay with me but as Iâ€™m looking through the menu I heard the workers in the back talking about they are cleaning and they are closing so it made me feel uncomfortable even orderingâ€¦. If the time for closing is 9 and theyâ€™re still serving why are the workers in the back complaining?â€¦. Overall the food is good here.
The place is very fast.  The food is average, typical diner. You seat yourself and the staff takes your order, the food comes out extremely quickly

As a family weâ€™d come almost every Sunday to Court Deli dinner. My partner and our 15 year old son usually dine in and itâ€™s our family time to catch up on the week. For us to check in with each other etc. the staff at Court Deli is always so welcoming when we arrive.

Once again the corned beef was not very good. I don't know which day of the week it is that the corned beef is nice and fresh, but it wasn't this day. I guess I keep going back because it's the only place near me that sometimes has a decent nice size corned beef sandwich, but for $18.50 make that $21 with tax it should be good every time and right near the courthouse you would think it would be better. I also think it depends on the person making the sandwich because sometimes it's a nice size and then there are days like this one when you say to yourself for $21 it should be bigger and better but I guess not many people order corned beef I can't say I won't go back again because I'm going to figure out the day of the week that I should go when it will be at its best because I do not like brown corned beef like I said  I was not happy

Food was great, but they wouldnâ€™t let me post a chaseoliverforpresident.com poster during election season! :( ;), write in chase Oliver for president and Mike Der Matt for vice president.! Thanks , _ Sashi
My favorite restaurant
